usecase.name: Add a new task in To Do list
usecase.description: User should be able to add a new task
steps: User should be on the To Do list page
User should click on the Add button
User should enter the task name and description
User should set the importance of the task on a scale of 1 to 10
User should click on the Submit button

testcases.name: Verify the Deadline is in the future
testcases.description: User should not be able to set the deadline in the past

expected.outcome: User should not be able to set the deadline in the past

testcases.name: Verify the task is added to the list
testcases.description: User should be able to see the task in the list

expected.outcome: The task is shown in the list
